# Necrotic Domination (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Living creature with necrotic cyst

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Libris Mortis (WotC), pg. 68

This spell functions like *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, except you can dominate any humanoid that harbors a necrotic cyst.

*Focus:* Caster must possess a mother cyst (*Libris Mortis* 28).
